description: This is the very first call a pilot makes to an airport's air traffic controller when entering their airspace to request an approach for landing.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: 20DME inbound DAC
calls.message: {DHK TWR} {Call Sign}, descending 4000 feet, 20DME inboud DAC

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Descend 3000ft, report 12DME arc
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {descend 3000ft}, {QNH 1013} report established 12DME arc for DIA-14

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Wilco, report 12DME arc
calls.message: {QNH 1013}, {descending 3000ft}, call you established 12dme arc {Call Sign}

description: A pilot makes this call to the airport controller when they are nearing the airport, to request permission to begin a descent and prepare for landing.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: 15DME inboud DAC
calls.message: {DHK TWR} {Call Sign}, descending 4000ft, 15DME inboud DAC

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Descend 3000ft, report VOR outbound
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {descend 3000ft}, {QNH 1013} report over VOR proceeding outbound of letdown for VDI-14

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Wilco, report VOR outbound
calls.message: {QNH 1013}, {descend 3000ft}, call you established outbound of letdown for VDI 14 {Call Sign}

description: This call is made by a pilot who has just finished training in a designated area and is requesting to re-enter the airport's main traffic pattern for a landing.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Request rejoin instruction
calls.message: {DHK TWR} {Call Sign}, descending 4000 feet, like to leave training area east, request rejoin instruction

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Descend 3000ft, report VOR outbound
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {descend 3000ft}, {QNH 1013} report over VOR proceeding outbound of letdown for VDI-14

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Wilco, report VOR outbound
calls.message: {QNH 1013}, {descend 3000ft}, call you established outbound of letdown for VDI 14 {Call Sign}

description: This call is made when a plane has flown directly over a VOR (a radio beacon used for navigation) and is now flying away from it to set up for the final landing approach.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Over VOR proceeding outbound
calls.message: {DHK TWR} {Call Sign}, over VOR proceeding outbound of letdown

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Clear for approach, report turning inbound
calls.message: {Call Sign}, clear for the approach, {descend 3000ft}, report turning inbound

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Wilco, report turning inbound
calls.message: Roger, cleared for the approach, {descend 3000ft}, call you turning inbound {Call Sign}

description: This call is made when a plane begins a turn to line up with the runway after flying away from the VOR, starting the final straight part of the approach.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Turning inbound
calls.message: {DHK TWR} {Call Sign}, turning inbound

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Report established localizer
calls.message: {Call Sign}, report established localizer runway 14

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Wilco, report established localizer
calls.message: call you established localizer, rwy 14 {Call Sign}

description: This is a call that happens when a plane is already perfectly lined up with the runway and has reached a distance of 6 miles, confirming it is on the correct path for landing.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: On localizer runway 14
calls.message: {DHK TWR} {Call Sign}, on localizer runway 14

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Report 6 ILS DME
calls.message: {Call Sign}, report 6 ILS DME

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Wilco, report 6 ILS DME
calls.message: call you 6 ILS DME {Call Sign}

description: This call is made by a pilot when they are flying a curved path, called an 'arc,' around the airport and have reached a specific radial (a navigational line) that marks their next turn.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Established 12DME arc
calls.message: {DHK TWR} {Call Sign}, established 12DME arc runway-14

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Report crossing R300
calls.message: {Call Sign}, report crossing R300

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Wilco, report crossing R300
calls.message: call you crossing R300 {Call Sign}

description: This is the call a pilot makes after completing a turn from a curved approach path to line up on the final, straight path to the runway.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Crossing R300
calls.message: {DHK TWR} {Call Sign}, crossing R300

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Clear for approach, report localizer
calls.message: {Call Sign}, clear for the approach, {descend 3000ft} report established localizer runway 14

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Wilco, report established localizer
calls.message: call you established localizer, rwy 14 {Call Sign}

description: This is the final call before landing, made by a pilot who is 6 miles away from the runway, to receive landing clearance and information about the wind.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: 6 ILS DME
calls.message: {DHK TWR} {Call Sign}, 6 ILS DME

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Cleared to land
calls.message: {Call Sign}, check gears down and locked, surface wind 230/05 knots, cleared to land runway-14

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Wilco, cleared to land
calls.message: gears green, s/w copied, Cleared to land {Call Sign}

description: A pilot makes this call immediately after the plane has touched down on the runway, to let the controller know they have landed and to get instructions on where to taxi next.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Landed
calls.message: {DHK TWR} {Call Sign}

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Taxi via S1, contact ground
calls.message: {Call Sign}, landed 1200, taxi via S1, after vacating contact ground 121.8

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Wilco, taxi via S1, contact ground
calls.message: taxi via S1, after vacating change to ground 121.8, call you vacated the runway {Call Sign}

description: This is a call made after a plane has completely left the main runway and is on a taxiway, to get directions to its final parking spot.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Runway vacated via S1
calls.message: {DHK GND} {Call Sign}, runway vacated via S1

calls.speaker: GRD
calls.caption: Taxi to stand 5
calls.message: {Call Sign}, Taxi via S1-S-C to Stand no 5

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Wilco, taxi to stand 5
calls.message: roger, taxi via S1-S-C to Stand no 5 {Call Sign}

description: This is the final call made to an airport's tower before leaving their airspace after a low pass, informing them of the pilot's intention to change to another controller.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: 3 miles turning right
calls.message: {DHK TWR} {Call Sign}, we are at 3 miles turning right, changing to tejgaon

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Change to Tejgaon
calls.message: {Call Sign}, change to tejgaon

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Wilco, changing to Tejgaon
calls.message: changing to tejgaon {Call Sign}
